bibl.title: A Note on O. Gerundense 1, Its Whereabouts, and the Formation of the Palau-Ribes Collection.
bibl.note: 1. The Ostracon Gerundense [O. Coll. privées: O. Gerudense 1 (= S.B. XII, 11160), recently identified among the ostraca from the Palau-Ribes Collection housed at the Arxiu Històric de la Companya de Jesús a Catalunya in Barcelona]. - 2. Its whereabouts. - III. The formation of the Palau-Ribes Collection.
bibl.seg: Alba de Frutos García, A Note on O. Gerundense 1, Its Whereabouts, and the Formation of the Palau-Ribes Collection.

1. The Ostracon Gerundense [O. Coll. privées: O. Gerudense 1 (= S.B. XII, 11160), recently identified among the ostraca from the Palau-Ribes Collection housed at the Arxiu Històric de la Companya de Jesús a Catalunya in Barcelona]. - 2. Its whereabouts. - III. The formation of the Palau-Ribes Collection.
